title: "API documentation: schedule of readings"

:::{.callout-note}
## Note
In determining readings for days in the liturgical year,
`Lectionary.jl` does not attempt to take account of transferal of the readings for a feast to another day. For example, feasts that fall on a Sunday or during Holy Week are normally transferred to a suitable following time.
:::
